bill.title: Relating to marijuana revenue; declaring an emergency.
bill.description: Directs Department of State Police to establish unit to assist county sheriffs' offices with law enforcement related to unlawful marijuana cultivation or distribution operations and with general local law enforcement needs. Directs Department of State Police to establish unit to assist county sheriffs' offices with law enforcement related to unlawful marijuana cultivation or distribution operations and with general local law enforcement needs. Directs Department of Revenue to transfer moneys from Oregon Marijuana Account to State Police Account for purposes of assisting county sheriffs' offices and to reduce subsequent amount transferred to Drug Treatment and Recovery Services Fund. Declares emergency, effective on passage.

history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Judiciary and Ballot Measure 110 Implementation, then Finance and Revenue.
